description: Investing in the stock market can be a great way to make money, but it can also be a bit daunting for beginners. This video will teach you the basics of how the stock market works, and give you some tips on how to get started. Watch now and learn how to make your money work for you!
introduction:
1.  Difference Between Saving and Investing | How to Create Wealth | Beginner Guide
2.  Financial Planning for Beginners | Benefits of Financial Planning
3.  Why Investing In Stock Market A Smart Move? | Learn Share Market | Importance of Investing
4.  Market Participants | Role of SEBI | Stock Market Eco System
5.  What is an IPO in Share Market | Initial public offering | Company Point of View | Part 01
6.  Learn IPO | Can you make a profit in IPO | margin required for IPO | How to apply for IPO | Part 02
7.  Fascinating Reasons Why Share Prices Go Up and Down Truth About Stock Prices Share Prices Move
